mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT m.resource FROM `sys_user_role` ur INNER JOIN `sys_role` r ON r.`id` = ur.`roleId` INNER JOIN `sys_role_menu` rm ON rm.`roleId` = ur.`roleId` INNER JOIN `sys_menu` m ON m.`id` = rm.`menuId` AND ur.`userId` = #{uid} AND r.`roleState` = 1 AND m.`resource` IS NOT NULL

SELECT DISTINCT m.`resource` FROM sys_user_role ur LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON ur.`roleId` = rm.`roleId` LEFT JOIN sys_menu m ON m.`id` = rm.`menuId` WHERE ur.`userId` = #{uid} AND m.`resource` IS NOT NULL AND m.`resource` != '' AND m.deep=3
